room_title: Escape room "Survive the Joker’s Trap" by Room Escape DC in Washington, D.C.
review: I did my first escape room here and had a blast. The staff was friendly and the puzzle appropriately challenging. We escaped the Joker room with 20 seconds to spare. I would go back again and recommend it.

room_title: Escape room "Survive the Joker’s Trap" by Room Escape DC in Washington, D.C.
review: Birthday party for my 14-year-old they had a great time and escaped the joker!

room_title: Escape room "Survive the Joker’s Trap" by Room Escape DC in Washington, D.C.
review: Jessy was awesome and we had a great time. We did the joker room in 45 minutes and it was awesome.
